title: ICE when implementing Drop for a typedef

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Works just fine when using `#[unsafe_destructor]` though.

Input:

``` rust
struct Foo<T>{
    x : T
}

type FooInt = Foo<int>;

impl Drop for FooInt {
    fn drop(&mut self){}
}
```

Output + Backtrace:
